name: Simple banner – Lightweight Announcement Banner Without jQuery
author: 56 Degrees

sections.description:
Simple banner is a lightweight WordPress plugin designed to easily add a customizable banner or announcement bar to your website without the need for jQuery. It is perfect for displaying important notifications, promotions, or announcements across your entire site or specific pages. The plugin is user-friendly, allowing you to quickly create and manage banners with customizable text, colors, and links. You can choose to display the banner at the top or bottom of your site and control its visibility with various options, including scheduling and targeting specific audiences. Ideal for enhancing user experience and ensuring visitors don’t miss critical information.

Features:

  • No jQuery Dependency: The plugin is built using vanilla JavaScript, ensuring a faster and more efficient load time for your website.
  • Easy Configuration: Customize the banner’s appearance directly from the WordPress admin panel. Adjust the background color, text color, font size, and more with a simple interface.
  • Customizable Content: Add any content you like to the banner, including text, links, or images, to convey your message effectively.
  • Responsive Design: The banner is fully responsive and will adapt to different screen sizes, ensuring it looks great on all devices.
  • Lightweight and Fast: With a minimal footprint, the Simple Banner plugin ensures that your site’s performance remains optimal.

Is there a tutorial for using the plugin?

Yes, you can watch our YouTube tutorial here: YouTube Tutorial

If you have any questions, you can contact us via email. tech@56degrees.co.uk
sections.installation:
1. Install the Plugin: Download and install the Simple banner – lightweight and without jQuery plugin from the WordPress plugin repository or upload it manually.
  2. Activate the Plugin: Go to the Plugins section in your WordPress admin dashboard and activate the Simple Banner plugin.
  3. Configure the Banner: Navigate to the Simple Banner settings page in the WordPress admin panel. Customize the banner’s appearance and content using the provided options.
  4. Save and Display: Save your settings, and the banner will be displayed on your website immediately.

With the Simple Banner plugin, you can effortlessly add a custom banner to your WordPress site, enhancing your site’s design and functionality without any hassle. Enjoy a seamless experience with a banner solution that’s both powerful and easy to use.
sections.faq:
What to use the plugin for?

You can use the plugin to quickly show information on a website in the form of a banner.

Is it difficult to edit?

You can click everything on the plugin side without adding custom css.
